LanguageData.AM_Skill_GaeBulg.description: Kill a single target in a complex and stylish animation that launches them into the air.\nAlways kills the target.
LanguageData.AM_Skill_GaeBulg.label: Lance Ultrakill
LanguageData.AM_Skill_Gilgamesh.description: Summons a myriad of weapons, of unknown origin, to impale the target. Does not require line of sight, and the onslaught of weapons is sure to kill the victim. However, such a feat of psychic ability will put the summoner in a psychic coma for around 2 days.
LanguageData.AM_Skill_Gilgamesh.label: Mystic Weapon Summon
LanguageData.AM_Skill_Weebstick.description: Slash through a single enemy using Scarlet Edge, killing them instantly.
LanguageData.AM_Skill_Weebstick.label: Scarlet Edge
